price: "Kendi aralarında gizlice siz ancak on gün kaldınız diye fısıldaşırlar."
arabic: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: yatakhāfatūna baynahum in labith'tum illā ʿashran
